hero.title: Welcome to Digital Island eGov Portal

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Access quality healthcare services and resources to support your well-being and that of your loved ones.

housing.title: Housing
housing.description: Access government services for housing solutions, construction permits, regulations, and more, tailored to meet your needs.

benefits-social-services.title: Benefits and Social Services
benefits-social-services.description: Explore a range of social services and benefits designed to enhance your quality of life and provide essential support.

identity-family.title: Identity and Family
identity-family.description: Manage your identity documents, family records, and important documents through secure and convenient online services.

business-labor.title: Business and Labor
business-labor.description: Navigate the world of business and employment with tools and resources tailored to entrepreneurs, workers, and employers.

travel-transformation.title: Travel and Transformation
travel-transformation.description: Navigate change with our government services, covering travel, relocations, transformations and visa assistance.

money-property.title: Money and Property
money-property.description: Manage your financial matters and property assets effectively using our digital tools and information.

crime-justice-law.title: Crime, Justice and Law
crime-justice-law.description: Access legal services, information on rights and responsibilities, and participate in the justice system of Digital Island.

construction-permit.login-to-access-service: Log in to access the service.
construction-permit.description: In compliance with building codes, Digital Island's Construction Permit Service provides a streamlined process for obtaining permits for your construction, renovation, or demolition projects. Submit applications securely online, ensuring a seamless experience backed by our commitment to regulatory adherence.

required-documents.title: Required Documents
required-documents.description: To initiate the application process for your construction permit, please ensure you have the following required documents ready for submission
required-documents.item1: Identification of the property owner, principal contractor and lead architect/engineer

required-fees.title: Required Fees
required-fees.desc1: Upon successful scrutiny of your application, the system will automatically calculate the required permit fee based on the specifics of your construction project

alternative-access-support.title: Alternative Access and Support
alternative-access-support.desc1: If it is not possible to use the e-Gov service or submit the documents in a digital medium, the application can be done via the city planning department.
alternative-access-support.desc2: Additionally, please feel free to use the provided contact information for any questions or inquiries you may have.

approved.description: Your construction permit application has been successfully reviewed and approved. This means you have been granted permission to proceed with your construction project as outlined in your application.
approved.desc1: In case of any modifications or changes to the approved plans, please seek necessary approvals
approved.desc2: You can find your construction permit via
approved.desc3: For any inquiries or assistance, please reach out to our

overview.heading: Application Overview
overview.title: Construction Permit Application
overview.description: For a successful application, please ensure all required documents and information are provided accurately for the construction permit.
overview.parcel-description: Provide the Parcel ID of the construction site in your application.
overview.identification-description: Provide the contact information for the owner, contractor, and lead architect or engineer.
overview.documents-description: Uploaded documents should be digitally signed by each person that is identified during the second step - identification.
overview.payment-fee: The payment fee will be calculated after reviewing the application.

parcel.title: Parcel ID
parcel.desc1: Please enter the Parcel ID of proposed work site.
parcel.desc2: Your Parcel ID can be found on property title, site plan, land cadastre or you can select via using the map.
parcel.placeholder: What is the Parcel ID? (7-Digit Parcel ID)

parcel-info.title: Parcel Information
parcel-info.placeholder: Please enter the Parcel ID to see the parcel information.

contact-information.title: Your Contact Information
contact-information.description: Please check your information and update your contact details if necessary
contact-information.name: Name

upload.title: Upload documents
upload.desc3: collectively by each person provided during the identification.

sent.title: Documents Submitted Successfully
sent.description: The requested documents have been successfully submitted and are now being reviewed by our team.

successful.title: Your Payment was Successful!
successful.desc1: You will receive notifications regarding the final outcome of your application.
successful.desc2: for the application review process to be completed.

overview.description: This fee covers the processing and administrative costs with your construction permit application.

review-details.title: Please review the details below
review-details.record-creation: Creation of records for requested construction permit

payment-options.title: Payment Options
payment-options.description: Please select a payment option to proceed

debit.title: Debit/Credit Card
debit.description: Enter your bank details for payment.

mobile.title: Mobile Money
mobile.description: Enter your mobile money details for payment.

wallet.title: Digital Wallet
wallet.description: Enter your digital wallet details for payment.

bank-transfer.title: Bank Transfer Payment
bank-transfer.description: For bank transfer payments, use the following account details
bank-transfer.account-holder: Bank Account Holder: Digital Island City Planning Department
bank-transfer.desc1: Please use your application number as the payment reference.
bank-transfer.desc2: Once you've made the payment, allow some processing time.

ongoing.title: Receiving payment order...
ongoing.process-time: This process might take some time

schedule.title: Thank You for Scheduling Your Site Inspection
schedule.appointment-details: Your appointment has been successfully scheduled. Here are the details
schedule.description: We appreciate your attention to this matter. If you require further assistance or any inquiries, please reach out to our support team.

feedback.title: We need your Feedback!
feedback.description: How would you rate your experience with our service?
feedback.experience: Let us know about your experience
feedback.experience-description: Did you accomplish what you intended to do in this session? Help us to understand what we can improve.

feedback-sent.desc1: Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our services.
feedback-sent.desc2: We greatly appreciate your time and input. Your suggestions and comments contribute to making our processes better and more user-friendly.

application-review.title: 1. Application Review
application-review.desc1: Our team will carefully review the submitted information and documents to ensure they meet the necessary requirements and comply with regulations.
application-review.desc2: You can track down your applications via
application-review.desc3: The processing time may vary depending on the complexity of your project and the volume of applications. You will receive notifications regarding the progress of your application.

additional-requests.title: (Optional) Additional Requests / Site Inspection
additional-requests.description: We may need more information from you. You will receive E-Mail notifications at key milestones of the application process, including approval, field visit requests, requests for additional information, or any other updates.

required-fee.title: 2. Required Fee
required-fee.desc1: Once your application is reviewed, the system will automatically calculate the required permit fee based on your project details. You will be notified to make the payment through our secure payment gateway.

outcome.title: 3. Final Outcome
outcome.description: Once the review process is complete, you will be notified of the final outcome of your application.

submitted.title: Application Submitted Successfully
submitted.description: Your application has been successfully submitted and is now under review by our team.

applications-list.description: Here you can easily check the details and progress of all your submitted construction permit applications.
applications-list.no-completed-applications: There are no finalized permit applications at the moment.

payment.title: Payment Required
payment.description: To facilitate the processing of your application, please proceed with the payment of the required fee. Once payment is complete, your application will be forwarded to stakeholders for clearance

schedule.title: Schedule Your Site Inspection
schedule.desc1: Please select a date from the available options.
schedule.desc2: Ensure your presence on the chosen date for the inspection.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Site Inspection
upcoming.description: Mandatory site inspection scheduled. Please ensure your presence on the specified date for the inspection.
upcoming.change-date-text: If you want to change or propose other dates, please contact

documents.title: Additional Documents Needed
documents.description: Additional documents are required for your application.

in-review.title: Application Under Review
in-review.desc1: Your construction permit application is currently under review by our team. We're  assessing your submission to ensure compliance with all necessary regulations.
in-review.desc2: You will receive updates on the progress via E-Mail and within your account. If you have any questions or need assistance, our support team is here to help.
